views.markdown:
BatteryLife displays useful information about your device's battery health and life.
The Tweak is considered a must-have for all jailbroken devices.

You can change the battery information of your device's Status Bar (choose from %, mAh, dis/charge, battery temperature, remaining battery time, and more).

There are many reasons why you should use the BatteryLife Tweak:
•	You want to view all battery readings
•	Unsure about a battery replacement? BatteryLife will tell you the exact remaining capacity.
•	Always know how long your battery will last, how much browsing time you've left and more

For a better overview of all features please take a look at the screenshots.

for all the translations made by the community and the beta testers!
